examples.example: 我的老公总是很体贴地关心我、照顾我。

translate.english: My husband always cares about me and takes care of me very considerately.

examples.example: 我的老公每天努力工作，为我们的美好生活拼搏着。

translate.english: My husband works hard every day and strives for our better life.

examples.example: 我的老公总是积极乐观地面对生活中的各种挑战。

translate.english: My husband always faces all kinds of challenges in life positively and optimistically.
